reviews.name: I would highly recommend this purchase
reviews.reviewBody: I am very happy with my purchase. I made this purchase one year ago and it still works great as the day that I hooked it up .The quality of the picture is outstanding. The sound quality is good. I like that there are so many free channels so I don’t need to bother with skyrocketing cable prices.

reviews.name: Enhanced TV Viewing Experience !!!
reviews.reviewBody:
Given that this is an entry level 75" inch TV and priced extremely competitive even amongst the non-major brands, its an extremely value for money product. 

Having owned a 55" TV, wanted to go for an 75". And I was too divided between an OLED and this, Ultimately, this being priced at about half of an OLED, I decided to go with this. 

The major limitation is that it has only 2 HDMI' ports and 1 USB. One of the HDMI is e-arc, which is great and I have connected to my sound bar and another to my firestick. Usually this is all I need, but I do occasionally connect my friend's Roku or my laptop  and that's when I have to disconnect my firestick. 
Yes, I do need the firestick as Tizen doesn't have a F1TV app.

Speaking of Tizen, it really needs a bit of improvement when it comes to apps. There are few key apps that still are missing. The picture clarity is much much better with Firestick than Tizen. 
Although the TV remote is huge and lot of buttons, it beautifully controls the firestick and my non-samsung soundbar and I dont have to toggle between remotes at any time. 
But with so many buttons, the lack of dedicated buttons for Sound and Picture settings baffles me. Samsung could have provided option to re-program the colored buttons. 

One of the major issue is light reflection. It really does hamper the viewing experience and I have to switch off the lights to enjoy my TV viewing. 

Another disadvantage is not able to adjust the legs distance, but I can understand why. Given the TV weight, I would feel comfortable placing the legs as far apart as possible to provide maximum stability. 
Absence of a headphone jack is another small limitation. Alternately I could connect to my Bluetooth headphones. Only when I and my wife want to use earphones to watch TV together, I miss the headphone jack to which I used to connect a splitter. 

Quite a few picture setting options - with Filmmaker option as well which is nice. I was watching an old movie with STANDARD settings and the clarity was brilliant. Even better than 55" TV, meaning upscaling works really well with appropriate Picture settings. 

This is not one of the brightest TV. I am having to watch the TV at around 80% of brightness levels but my older TVs I usually watch at 60%. 

Sound quality is not bad at all, but using a soundbar is definitely better. 

 Overall, its an absolute value for money TV and the whole experience of watching in a 75" TV is awesome.

reviews.name: 75 Inch Samsung
reviews.reviewBody: I love my 75 inch Samson Tv.  Picture is very clear and sound is awesome.  My husband and I will purchase again at Best Buy.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number of digital cables carrying analog (VGA) video signals that can be connected to the product.
This is technology that's specific to a TV brand (sometimes called proprietary technology). Here you'll see terms related to picture quality, brightness, processors and more.

The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.

reviews.name: Vibrant Color, Detailed Picture, Great Contrast
reviews.reviewBody:
The first thing I have to mention about the Samsung S89C 77” OLED tv is how well the packaging is designed.

I was able to remove the tv from the box and install the legs by myself due to the very clever packaging and the easy to follow instructions included in the box.

Also included with the tv is a solar remote control. This remote does not use batteries. You charge it with a usb-c cable and when you are not using it you turn it on its back and expose the solar panel to any light. This will extend the life of each charge of the remote.

The remote is small, very comfortable in your hand and very intuitive.  It is not backlit, but I found that to be unnecessary as I never had to look at the remote while using it. There are preset buttons for Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video and Samsung+.

The settings button is also very useful.

There are also cable clips and a back cover which are provided for cable management.

Once out of the box you are immediately impressed with the design of the tv.

It is extremely thin and premium looking.

Setup was simple and the user interface guides you through the process.

The tv comes set in Eco mode. I changed it to Standard, but you can choose from Filmmaker, Movie and Dynamic also.

The picture quality was fantastic, though I had to change the color temperature to warm, which I recommend.  It was very bright with great contrast. Blacks are very black which contrasts with the bright whites without any blooming or bleeding into each other. I watched NFL games which were clear, bright and smoothe.

Movies were very enjoyable to watch, even cable tv was crystal clear with exceptional detail and natural skintones.

The quality of the sound, produced by the 40 watt speakers was much better than anticipated. And you can amplify the sound which makes dialogue much clearer. I found the voices to be very accurate. I will connect a soundbar at a later date, but until then I am content with the tv speakers.

Other features include:

4 HDMI  2.1 ports including an eArc.

Dolby Atmos

HDR and HDR+

Bluetooth 5.2

Alexa voice controls built-in, however also works with Google Assistant.

You can share the tv screen with your phone or laptop.

I guess the best way to show how impressed I am with this tv is the fact that I have two 75” quantum dot lcd tvs in my house, but since I got this tv I don’t watch them anymore. I find myself going to this tv first.

One thing I didn’t like is that you are forced to sign up for a Samsung account. I skipped this during setup, but then when I tried to install Paramount+ it would not allow it until I created the Samsung account. I have not had this issue with any other tv, and I found it to be annoying and intrusive.
I would also like Samsung to support Dolby Vision.

Overall I am very happy with this tv. It has met or exceeded every expectation that I had.

A beautiful detailed picture, and a very intuitive user interface and remote control.

I would recommend this tv to everyone.

reviews.name: Great Picture, Meh OS, Minor Display Bend
reviews.reviewBody:
UNBOXING:

This is a 2-person job and I really wouldn’t recommend attempting to set up the S89C alone. To unbox, you’ll lift the cardboard up which will reveal the TV sitting in a protective foam enclosure. Overall, it was packaged decently well, but for such a thin panel, it does feel like perhaps there would be better packaging. But if it’s delivered without issue, then it shouldn’t be a serious concern.

Inside of the box, you’ll have the TV, power cable, detachable stand, solar remote control, documentation, cable cover, and a 3.5mm male to RCA female adapter.

SETUP:

If you decide to use the stand, one of the really nice aspects of setting up the S89C is that you can install the stand before you fully remove it from the box. The stand on the S89C is mounted at the center of the TV as opposed to the edges of the frame. So Samsung opted to make it easy to remove the middle of the packaging so that the stand can be mouned before removing the TV from the box. No tools are needed to install the stand, either.

Once you’ve installed the stand using the included instructions, it requires two people on each side to lift the TV onto your desired surface. After which, you can install all the necessary cables and attach the cable cover.

Alternatively, you can also VESA mount the TV to a wall, and the screws are installed in a 400mm x 300mm configuration, so you’ll need to use a mount that can be adjusted to meet this specification.

Then the software setup can be performed either by smartphone through the Samsung SmartThings app with a QR code, or with the physical remote. With that said, I recommend using the app, and if possible, using the Smart Calibration which leverages your smartphone’s camera to calibrate the S89C’s display. I’ll touch on that later.

BUILD:

The Samsung S89C weighs in at 79.4lbs with the stand, and the vast majority of the build is going to be slightly more than ¼” inches—which is less than many smartphones, while the thicker portion at the bottom of the TV is a mere 1.8”. Excluding the stand, the TV yields a cubic volume of 67.7in x 38.9in x 1.8in.

I did notice some small gaps in the build where the mainboard enclosure meets the display, but this isn’t something to be particularly concerned about. That being said, I think for the price being paid, many folks would expect a more consistent build.

More importantly, I did notice that because the bottom half of the TV has the electronics whereas the top half only has the display, there really isn’t a ton of structural support for the top half. As a result, when I looked at the side of the TV, I noticed that the display exhibited a very subtle backwards bend. And if I’m being honest, this isn’t the first time this in a large-format Samsung OLED TV. Because Samsung keeps making these TVs so incredibly thin, it is much more likely that they may develop a subtle bend during packaging, transportation, and delivery. I experienced this on the smaller Samsung 65” S95B, and it continues its legacy here on the larger 77” S89C.

That being said, it is not noticeable unless you are paying very close attention, and it’s certainly not noticeable at all when you are looking straight at the display. Even so, I have owned or inspected other OLED TVs at this size and they do not design them this thin without structural support for reasons like this. So your mileage may vary, but it’s also not an infrequent occurrence—the question is how much bend you will have as opposed to if there is one at all.

Other than that, you have 4x HDMI 2.1 ports which is refreshing to see considering how many TVs may only have 1 or 2 that may have full support, and the remote control charges via USB-C and by a solar cell on the back of the remote.

DISPLAY:

With display bends aside, how does it perform in terms of color, fluidity, and HDR?

Out of the box, before running the Smart Calibration through the SmartThings app, I noticed that the HDR performance leaned towards making content overly bright and blown out, and there was more frequent color-banding in gradients. But after Smart Calibration, this was significantly improved with better dynamic range and less color banding between gradients. So I highly recommend using the Smart Calibration if possible.
With that done, the performance of the S89C is fantastic to my eyes. This is using a WOLED panel from LG Display, not to be confused with the higher-end QD-OLED displays that Samsung is manufacturing. If you’re looking for QD-OLED, you’ll need to look at the S90C model.

The S89C has very rich contrast, and colors appear vivid and punchy with more of a life-like appearance as opposed to artificial. Things like color banding may be more prevalent depending on your source device, the quality of the content,how you’ve configured the settings of that device, as well as the S89C, itself. In my testing, using an Apple TV yielded the best overall color performance with streaming services compared to the same services on the native Tizen OS of the S89C.

HDR content also looks fantastic on the S89C thanks to the OLED panel. When presented with scenes where there is incredibly bright content juxtaposed with darker content, the S89C is able to represent both on the display without causing blooming. Moreover, I never experienced any screen flickering in my tests. I used the full gamut of features with 4K HDR with Variable Refresh Rate and at 120Hz. When all these features were in effect simultaneously, the S89C did quite well. Games were responsive with low input latency, high refresh rate, and with incredible contrast and dynamic range thanks to OLED’s incredible HDR performance.

Another feature I’d like to mention is that with a compatible PC connected, the S89C can yield a 144Hz refresh rate which may be desirable for PC gamers, and it’s possible across all 4 HDMI ports.

AUDIO:

The S89C is equipped with 40W of audio output via 2.1 channels. In my testing, the audio was actually reasonably good. For those who do not yet own a dedicated sound system and aren’t interested in purchasing one, I think that they will be pleased with the clarity of the audio from the S89C. While you won’t have amazing directionality or deep bass, audio was clear without sounding tinny, dialog was easily understood without muffling, and cinematic audio effects were able to preserve their overall intent.

SOFTWARE:

The Tizen OS software is reasonably responsive on the S89C, but it can also be a bit cumbersome to use in certain circumstances. Navigating between your HDMI inputs requires more button presses because there aren’t any dedicated shortcuts on the remote for your HDMI inputs. If you’re the kind of person who normally avoids using the integrated smart TV OS, you won’t be able to completely avoid it on this TV.

The remote itself is incredibly minimalist with no numeric buttons for channels, so it’s fine for directional controls in onboard apps, but not for navigating to a specific channel on your cable box. You’ll of course have all the mainstays like Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus, YouTube, and Hulu, as well as an app store for others. A few of which have shortcuts on the remote control in addition to the Samsung TV Plus service.

You can use a voice assistant either through Alexa or through Bixby, but these were often hit or miss. Sometimes I could ask for a specific thing and it would find it, and other times it would struggle to understand what I was asking for.

I think that the user experience could use some improvement across Tizen OS, but with such a simplified physical remote control, it will always be limited in how quickly you can navigate. I understand there are people who may be happy using the onboard smart TV software for all their streaming needs, but I just continue to find that most smart TV operating systems can be sluggish or provide non-intuitive user experiences. While Tizen OS is pretty responsive overall, it really seems like the onboard processing of video streams is not as good as dedicated Apple TV hardware.

But I am at least happy that it doesn’t freeze up and lag every time I try to navigate through the OS.

CONCLUSION:

Overall, I think the S89C is a solid 77” OLED TV. It has solid performance for cinematics and games, and its native Tizen OS is responsive albeit perhaps more cumbersome to navigate for certain circumstances. When compared to its competitors, it has more build quality issues due to the incredibly thin design, but its visual performance is solid after calibration, and the audio performance is also quite good for onboard audio. If you’re evaluating this TV against the competitors, I’d say its biggest shortcoming is that its OS is less mature, and its display is more susceptible to bends due to its very thin design.

reviews.name: Stop Looking around you found your TV
reviews.reviewBody:
Samsung 77” OLED TV
Another great TV from Samsung! This must have TV is one of the best Pictures I have seen. You never can tell how good a TV is going to look on the showroom floor. I have to say that I was not disappointed in what I received. I installed this TV in my basement, and I enjoy entertaining while watch NFL games. This is going to blow them away!

The colors are vibrant - the reds pop out, in addition to all the other colors. They say the QLED is a darker black – the black in the TV is great. I couldn’t tell you how great this comes out. They have done a great job on the darkness, and you couldn’t tell the difference. Perhaps if you had two screens side by side in a dark room, you might be able to notice the color contrast.

The sound that comes out of this is truly amazing: clean, clear sound. The bass is the only thing missing if you wanted surround sound, but you could easily connect a sound bar or subwoofer, if desired. You don’t have to really turn the volume to have to hear it. I don’t know how they did it because the TV is so slim it’s not like they have a lot of room to put big speakers in the TV for the sound that come out from it. This has Surround sound supported Doubly Audio. This will connect to a sound bar from Bluetooth or Optic cable.

The TV has 4 HDMI inputs it has a dedicated port for your gaming device. The remote will turn on your XBOX, which is an awesome feature. The XBOX app is also on the homepage where you can launch your XBOX by streaming without your console. I am an avid XBOX player and I can really appreciate this feature. I’m old-school and still have my console connected to the new TV with an HDMI cable. 
 
The refresh rate is 120H, which is the same on a QLED - nothing different except the darkness of the black. The TV works with Amazon, Alexa, or Google Assistant. The streaming works with Apple TV, Disney, HBO Max, Netflix, Prime Video, and has Spotify and YouTube ready to go. Samsung is one of the few TV that works with DIRECTV stream. I use DIRECTV stream and enjoy using only 1 remote. I can now eliminate the use of the additional Roku remote now.

The remote control is so easy to use. Setting up the TV is simple - you can use the remote or use your phone for easy set up. The TV is smart capable and FreeSync Premium (AMD Adaptive sync) this makes it go fast between devices so it’s seamless. Samsung did a great job with the packaging. I was able to break the box apart and assemble the TV and stand by myself.

Overall, I can tell you the in’s and out of this TV, but if you’re looking to buy one, you have probably already done all of your research about the TVs on the market. This has been one of the best TVs I’ve owned - from the out of the box experience to the set up. The color and sound are just awesome. In my opinion, this is the best TV out on the market today. You will enjoy your new TV for days to come – especially if you’re a sports fan! There is no lag in the game from refresh rate and the audio is not bad. Like I said, I do have a sound bar, but it’s not needed since the sound is great from such a slim TV. I can’t wait to have more people over to watch the game and enjoy the view like being at the game.

descriptions.long: Prepare to be captivated. Whether you prefer dramatic thrillers or fantasy football, lose yourself in the viewing adventure with a contrast rich picture. Let your picture do the talking with the sleek and thin Laser Slim design. You’ll see pure blacks, bright whites and dramatic color, while the audio pulls you into the action thanks to Dolby Atmos built in and Object Tracking Sound Lite. The Samsung OLED experience doesn’t stop there shifting adventures is a breeze with access to the latest Smart TV apps and Samsung Gaming Hub.

features.title: OLED Technology
features.description: You’ll see your favorite movies, games, and more in a whole new light thanks to the mesmerizing picture quality across a full range of gorgeous colors. Only a powerhouse brand like Samsung can provide incredible detail and unbelievable screen brightness.
Plus, with pure blacks and more than a billion shades of color, combined with 8.3 million self illuminating pixels (ultra fast switching tiny lights) reveals virtually limitless contrast.

features.title: Neural Quantum Processor with 4K Upscaling
features.description: Sit back and be mesmerized as your content is transformed to 4K. Whether you’re streaming an HD movie, watching live sports, or looking back at home videos,
experience it all transformed into sharp 4K resolution with our high performance, AI powered processor that upgrades your content scene by scene.¹

features.title: Quantum HDR OLED
features.description: Witness the difference detail can make. With fine tuned brightness and optimized contrast made possible by self illuminating pixels, your picture is instantly enhanced as HDR OLED analyzes each scene so you can enjoy rich and accurate colors.

features.title: Pantone Validated ™
features.description: Enjoy color validated by industry leading experts at Pantone®, so that images on the screen look as incredible as they do in real life.
From every fantastic detail on your favorite runway competition to each course of drool worthy cooking shows, experience it all in a whole new way only on Samsung screens.

features.title: Dolby Atmos ™ and Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Keep your ears on the action with Dolby Atmos ™® and virtual top speakers that follow the story. When a dragon swoops across the screen, 3D sound moves right along with it thanks to Object Tracking Sound Lite.

features.title: Anti Glare with Ultra Viewing Angle
features.description: Pick a seat, any seat. There isn’t a bad one in the house thanks to Anti Glare with Ultra Viewing Angle technology. You’ll get a consistent and detailed 4K picture at any angle, in any light with pristine color across the entire screen.

features.title: LaserSlim Design
features.description: Let your picture do the talking with the Samsung OLED’s LaserSlim design. This sleek TV looks beautiful anywhere with a depth of only 4mm its virtually bezel free.²

features.title: Q Symphony
features.description: Amp up your audio with the greatest duo of all time Samsung TVs paired with a Samsung soundbar . With Q Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q Series and S Series soundbar operate as one.
Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience.³

features.title: Motion Xcelerator Turbo Pro
features.description: Hold onto your seats your high speed games and movies are approaching peak performance with exceptional motion enhancements.
Motion Xcelerator Turbo Pro creates consistently crisp 4K visuals at blazing fast speeds up to 120hz and Game Motion Plus goes up to 144hz with compatible PC connected content.

features.title: Samsung Gaming Hub
features.description: Where gaming comes together. Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required.⁴
¹ Utilizes AI Based formulas.
² Q Series and S Series soundbars sold separately.
³ Q Series and S Series soundbars sold separately.

reviews.name: Blown Away By The Quality
reviews.reviewBody: Listen ive seen almost every tech review about Sony samsung and LG. I love the colors and the fidelity from oled but the brightness and power consumption from mini Led (neo, mini, q, etc). After all my reserach i went with the Sony Bravia Oled A80L because when you put in on vivid its almost as bright as the LED models. The blacks on LG is great but it will distort your media into the darker hue as those tv’s don’t seem to understand greyscale. Its either the pixel is on or off. Sony understands that grays are important and their pictures are vibrant. Samsung tvs also look amazing however the saturation is washed out making people look lighter than they normally should be. Hands down sony bravia. They have made me. Believer in their products.

reviews.name: LOVE MY SONY!
reviews.reviewBody: We are loving our new Sony TV. The picture is beautiful. The sound is amazing with our sound bar, powered subwoofer and rear speakers. It does everything you would expect from a TV and does it well. Settings menus are easy to navigate with a lot of customizable features.

reviews.name: Top notch television
reviews.reviewBody: Great picture with amazing color and very clear sound. I love how the TV will not have any light or sun glare on the screen!

descriptions.long: Exceptional OLED picture and rich sound in perfect harmony, powered by the intelligent Cognitive Processor XR™. Billions of accurate colors and pure black make everything you watch and play come to life with natural hues and shades. Acoustic Surface Audio+™ turns the entire screen into a multi-channel speaker that follows the action on screen for a truly immersive viewing experience.

features.title: Intelligent and powerful TV processing
features.description: See how real your entertainment can be, with immersive depth and lifelike picture quality, powered by Sony’s intelligent Cognitive Processor XR™. Hundreds of thousands of individual on-screen elements are processed and remastered in the blink of an eye.

features.title: Pure black and stunning highlights
features.description: Feel the beauty of OLED contrast with pure black and lifelike brightness. XR OLED Contrast Pro™ analyzes and enhances the picture for immersive depth and realism, resulting in ultra-detailed shadows and crisp, clean peak highlights.

features.title: Billions of real-world colors
features.description: Access billions of accurate colors and reproduce each shade with the subtle differences seen in the real world. XR Triluminos Pro enhances the range of hues and saturation, revealing extremely precise details within textures, and skin tones that look completely natural.

features.title: The entertainment you love. With help from Google
features.description: With 700,000+ movies and TV episodes, live TV, and more available across 10,000+ apps, Google TV takes streaming and live TV to the next level, bringing together your favorite entertainment from across your apps and organizing it all, just for you.

features.title: Movies on us with BRAVIA CORE™
features.description: With the BRAVIA CORE™ app, enjoy the latest Sony Pictures Entertainment titles and the largest IMAX® Enhanced collection. Simply redeem the included credits to choose from hundreds of the latest releases.

features.title: All your game settings in one place
features.description: With Game Menu, quickly manage your gaming picture settings and exclusive assist features in a single convenient interface. Get access to features like Black Equalizer, apply Crosshair overlay, and use Screen Size feature to shrink your screen for precision gaming.

features.title: Level up your gaming with HDMI 2.1 features
features.description: Sony TVs deliver a thrilling gaming experience with support for 4K/120, VRR, and ALLM as specified in HDMI 2.1. With 4K/120 you get up to 120fps in 4K resolution on compatible games.

features.title: Perfect for PlayStation® 5
features.description: Get detailed, responsive game play and feel the action all around you with Sony TV exclusive feature for the PlayStation® 5 console. Auto HDR Tone Mapping automatically adjusts the HDR settings of the PS5® console to the TV for detailed, high-contrast scenes.

features.title: Cinematic content as the creator intended
features.description: Get extraordinary picture quality and enjoy your favorite content the way it was designed to be seen. Dolby Vision® makes scenes come to life with striking highlights, deeper blacks, and vibrant colors.

features.title: The screen is the speaker with sound and picture in perfect harmony
features.description: Hear an exceptional audio experience with more realistic sound and clear dialogue. With Acoustic Surface Audio+™, actuators behind the TV vibrate to produce sound from the entire screen and elevate the soundstage.

features.title: Pairs perfectly with Sony soundbars
features.description: Paired with select Sony soundbars, our latest TVs go even further to bring you an unmatched audio-visual experience. Acoustic Center Sync synchronizes the TVs speakers with the soundbar, reinforcing the center speaker channel for clearer, fuller vocals.

features.title: Bring back lost texture and detail, the intelligent way
features.description: Bring back lost texture and detail, with reduced noise and blur, and see all your HD and digital content upscaled to near-4K resolution with XR Clear Image and XR 4K Upscaling.

features.title: Intelligent motion processing for fast-moving, blur-free scenes
features.description: Watching sports and action-packed movies just got a whole lot better. XR OLED Motion combats blur and judder by cross-analyzing key visual elements and precisely controlling the action in every scene.

features.title: Hands-free help from Google
features.description: With hands free voice control built into Sony TVs with Google TVs, you can set aside your remote and simply use your voice to search and access entertainment, get answers, control TV and smart home devices and streamline your day. Just say “Hey Google” to get started.

features.title: All your favorite streaming apps in one place
features.description: Sony TVs with Google TV give you access to all your favorite streaming apps in one place, including Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, YouTube, the Apple TV app, HBO Max, Peacock, and many more.

features.title: Family-friendly smart TV
features.description: Discover a fun collection of movies and shows for the whole family. Create a Kids Profile that can help you guide children to age-appropriate content. Set parental controls to restrict what streaming services are shown, limit watching time, and even set bedtimes.

features.title: Works with Apple AirPlay
features.description: With Apple AirPlay support, you can share pictures, video, or audio to your television right from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Watch movies and shows from your favorite apps, the Apple TV app, or even from Safari.

features.title: Beautifully designed to complement your space
features.description: Our premium, minimalist One Slate design keeps you focused on the big picture. The versatile, three-way, multi-position stand gives you the option of a low-profile setting that focuses your attention on the picture.

features.title: Discover new ways to enjoy TV with BRAVIA CAM
features.description: Connect BRAVIA CAM, sold separately, for an even more dynamic viewing experience. Ambient Optimization Pro recognizes where you’re sitting in the room and automatically optimizes the picture and sound for the environment.

features.title: All your energy-saving settings in one place
features.description: With the flexible and configurable Eco Dashboard, energy saving settings can now be centrally managed. You can easily customize energy saving settings for your TV usage, viewing environment, and the content you are watching, all in one place.

reviews.name: Good TV for the money
reviews.reviewBody: This is a very good quality OLED tv for the money you're paying. For an entry level oled the image quality is great, sound comung out of the speakers is more than decent and the magic remote is a nice touch. The UI moves fluently, seen better but I cant expect more for the price.  Overall I would give it a 7.8/10.

reviews.name: LG OLED 77
reviews.reviewBody: The difference between OLED Tv and a let’s say normal one are huge and maybe some of you who reads this don’t understand but let me tell you that the picture quality it’s high superior from the “basic tv’s”…highly recommended!…….

reviews.name: Great 4k oled tv with good audio.
reviews.reviewBody: This TV is great! I got it on sale at a good price, the brightness, audio, and quality are all good. I didn't connect it to the internet at all so that it doesn't spy on me ( they don't make "dumb" TV's with picture quality like this. I use a Chromecast instead... the remote has wii controller technology, that works well once you get use to it. I would recommend this TV to anyone!

descriptions.long: Experience a lifelike picture with more depth and rich colors thanks to LG's advanced α7 Gen5 AI Processor 4K that adjusts picture and sound qualities to give you a fabulous experience no matter what you’re watching. Additionally, binge-worthy streaming starts here with built-in access to Netflix, Prime Video, the Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max¹ and over 300+ free LG Channels² with everything from comedy to movies to sports. Plus, you can customize your viewing experience with separate accounts and personalized recommendations for every member of your family from webOS 22. Quickly point, click, scroll or use voice control to find your favorite content faster with the LG Magic Remote. It’s not just OLED. It’s LG OLED. The gold standard in OLED TV from the creators of OLED.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

specifications.definition: VGA (Video Graphics Adapter or Video Graphics Array) is a display standard that transmits via analog signals. This type of interface is typically used to connect a computer to a display device such as a monitor, projector, or TV.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
RS-232 inputs are the serial-data standard for telecommunications. The more inputs the PC or device has, the more peripherals (TVs, monitors) it can connect to and control.

features.description: The perfect picture is closer than ever thanks to AI Picture Pro that automatically enhances contrast and resolution with AI 4K Upscaling and AI Tone Mapping for outstanding lifelike images every time you watch.³

features.description: Everything you see on screen matches what was originally shot for a more accurate viewing experience.⁴

features.title: 100% Color Volume
features.description: Take in the rich and accurate colors from the brightest to darkest parts of the scene.⁵

features.title: Dynamic Tone Mapping
features.description: Dynamic Tone Mapping uses the α7 Gen5 AI Processor to detect what you’re seeing and apply the optimal tone curve, resulting in more natural color, deep contrast and intricate detail.

features.title: FILMMAKER MODE, Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos
features.description: Get in the action the way directors intended with FILMMAKER MODE — and enhance every moment with Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos for the ultimate home theater experience.

reviews.name: Loving our Samsung TV!
reviews.reviewBody:
We purchased this tv a few weeks ago as an upgrade to a smaller tv. The picture quality and color saturation are better than expected, given the price point. Set up and mounting the tv on our family room wall was straightforward, along with connecting to our Wi-Fi and streaming service.  The speakers are not the greatest, but we connected the tv to our Samsung sound bar, so really not an issue for us.  

Overall, very pleased with our purchase. You can’t go wrong with Samsung!

reviews.name: Money Well Spent!
reviews.reviewBody: This tv is amazing! It’s my most favorite recent purchase. I will literally make time to sit in front of my tv everyday. LOL. The quality is A1 of course, never expected any less from Samsung. I also enjoy the customizable settings. It almost gives windows computer vibes. If I had to suggest one thing I would say they should have created a talk option for the remote conrol and apps. Other than that, I’m very satisfied with my purchase! As well as the Best Buy shopping experience. Thank you! :)

reviews.name: Samsung 85, Love It
reviews.reviewBody: I absolutely adore my Samsung 85 Crystal UHD! I purchased it with the intention of experiencing the thrill of being in a movie theater without having to take my kids out every time to watch movies. This TV fulfills my expectations perfectly, and it caters to my needs. Not only do I find it to be a perfect addition to my home, but my kids also love it. It's a win-win for all of us

descriptions.long: True-to-life color. Effortless connectivity. Dazzling 4K value. Samsung Crystal UHD is worth a look (and more). Effortlessly access TV shows, movies and ambient content using the Samsung Smart Hub, or find a range of great games on the Samsung Gaming Hub.* Enjoy content even more clear than it was created as its upgraded to 4K resolution

features.title: PurColor
features.description: See a wider spectrum of colors than traditional RGB models with PurColor. From green turf to an amazing sunset, you’ll enjoy true-to-life picture quality with our innovative color technology.

features.title: Crystal Processor with 4K UHD Upscaling
features.description: Go from good to great. Watch the content you love upgraded to dazzling 4K resolution. You’ll be able to better enjoy your TV’s capabilities as the Crystal Processor automatically transforms color, sound and more.

features.title: Mega Contrast
features.description: See more detail as our Mega Contrast analyzes and adjusts each image. Every frame appears more natural, and a feeling of depth is added as contrast is dialed up in the foreground.

features.title: HDR
features.description: Take in an impressive spectrum of colors and fine details, even in the darkest scenes. Brightness and contrast are automatically dialed into their ideal levels in every frame so you can see your content as it’s meant to be seen.

features.title: Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Get in the mix with Object Tracking Sound Lite. You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio.

features.title: Q-Symphony
features.description: Amp up your audio with the greatest duo of all time—Samsung TVs paired with a Samsung soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one.
Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience.¹

features.title: Samsung Smart TV Hub
features.description: Finding what everyone wants to watch is effortless with the easy-to-use Samsung Smart TV Hub. Movies, TV show and games are all available on a home screen tailored to you.²

features.title: Samsung Gaming Hub
features.description: Where gaming comes together. Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required.³
¹ Q-Series and S-Series soundbars sold separately.

³ High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required.

description: Shop LG 65" Class C3 Series OLED 4K UHD Smart webOS TV at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Returned QM8 for LG C3
reviews.reviewBody: I originally purchased my second TCL TV (QM8) and returned it within 24 hours. Severe issues with internal audio and clarity. I was on the fence between replacing it with Hisense U8 and the LG C3.  I wanted a high quality panel as the room its in doesnt have a lighting issue so a TV that produced bright HDR is not something i really needed. The C3 hit the mark, panel colors are superb, internal audio is crisp and the built in AI audio and picture settings are good enough for me out of the box.  Theres a filmaker mode which i havent used yet but that is a simple way to turn off LG processing settings quickly. The only gripe is the Alexa pairing app. Dont use it, download the skill on your alexa app and configure it that way. LG has been good for me the last 13 years and i expect the same quality out of this TV.

reviews.name: LG Oled C3: Welcome to a new Viewing Experience
reviews.reviewBody: This TV is truly an experience. I hadn’t updated my home TV in quite some time and decided to get a 65”. Found this gem and thought it would be great for the PS5 and content consumption: it was far beyond what i could imagine. Superb picture quality and a wide array of different options you can tinker with to get the picture you want. Whatever great reviews you read are true, and if you are waiting to get this TV on sale you’ll definitely be able to find deals. Be patient, purchase it when you can, and enjoy the full experience of everything you watch.

reviews.name: Deep blacks, rich colors, satisfied.
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent picture quality. This is our first OLED set, and I love the deep blacks and rich colors. The WebOS takes some getting used to. The this bezel makes this set very attractive. A couple minor cons - lack of ATSC 3.0 (next gen tv) tuner and no MLB app available.  I am using a Roku for MLB and an outboard ATSC tuner as a result. I was able to mount the TV on the wall without any help, because of a manageable weight. We are using an outboard AV receiver, so I can’t comment on the built in speakers, except that they are better than average.

reviews.name: Best bang for the buck
reviews.reviewBody:
Understand what your buying. This is Samsungs entry level tv. That being said the picture is beautiful. For most people no one will notice any difference. I bought two of these for a game room and the do the job. Game mode has very low input lag. Very good for casual gaming. Now that being said “if” you are looking for the ultimate picture and processing power this tv is not it. But don’t get it twisted this tv is only 300$ and I would say best bang for the buck. 
Samsung tv is free lots of channels 
Remote and functions are great 
Games and tv super clear 
Small frame around tv
Phone screen sharing works flawless 

I hate to use the word cons for a tv like this 
because for the price in mind there isn’t anything. There are difference is tv models. 

Under call of duty and very fast moving games with a lot going on the tv will struggle every once in a while for a split second. It’s not just one tv because remember I bought 2 and play on both. Now that’s not a complaint because it’s literally the cheapest model Samsung has to offer. 

Would I recommend to people 100% the tv does a beautiful job. Just don’t be cheap and expect the best tv known to man. And I say that not trying to make the tv sound bad because I think you will be surprised with how well this thing runs and looks.

reviews.name: Stunning Television
reviews.reviewBody: Expensive but worth it if you enjoy watching films and/or gaming and you care about having the best possible picture quality. The picture is amazing and the TV itself when installed on the wall is extremely elegant. The included wall mount is easy to install (although I did have to buy additional hardware to satisfy my own desire for maximum security--the included hardware is meant for mounting on a concrete wall). The additional notes on the Best Buy page indicate that this includes a $200 mount for keeping the TV on a stand. Mine did not include this mount, and I'm not sure if that was an oversight or if they are just no longer available. I was initially kind of disappointed, but I can't imagine not having this beautiful TV on the wall. I personally love the remote and the OS as well. So far I'm very happy with this purchase. I did have to buy a couple longer HDMI cables due to the cables being routed from the far left side of the TV (as you can see in the photo which was taken prior to getting the longer cables and finishing with a cord hiding unit).

reviews.name: Definitely worth the wait. Remarkable
reviews.reviewBody: I had been researching and looking at tvs for about almost 2 years. I originally looked at the g2 and didn’t pull the trigger. Once lg announced the g3 with mla technology I was excited and waited till there was some reviews. Definitely worth the wait. The upscaling from sd is probably the best I have seen to the hdr and Dolby vision that is remarkable. Love the way it sits pretty flat to the wall with the included wall mount. The only negative I could think of was the instructions for the mounting the tv and the included anchors are horrible. But other than that I wish I would have bought it sooner.

reviews.name: Great TV! One large caveat..
reviews.reviewBody:
Just getting it out of the way.. right now I'm giving the overall score and picture score 4 stars instead of 5 due to one issue. Flickering. This TV flickers whether you are watching Dolby Vision, HDR 10 or SDR content. The effect looks like there is a torch to the side of or behind the camera when watching low light scenes in movies or shows. You see the picture getting lighter and darker.
LG is aware of the issue but I have not seen any commitments to a fix and I have been looking. I may need to return the TV for this reason which is a shame... it's a great TV otherwise.

Now to the positives.

This TV has a beautiful picture. It gets extremely bright and is very colorful. LG's color boosting technology works! 
Upscaling of lower resolution content is also shockingly good and I'm coming from Sony TVs which are considered to be the best in the business at upscaling.
Motion is great as well.. LG is making nice strides here.

If you are a sports or gaming fan, don't hesitate to get this TV because you will be in love. I just caution those who like to watch darker shows and movies for the previously mentioned flickering. Outside of that I love this TV.

features.title: It's not just OLED, it's LG OLED
features.description: LG OLED TVs have been the world's #1 OLED brand for 10 consecutive years.¹ Setting the standard for innovation and excellence, LG OLED TVs bring to life brilliant color and perfect black on over 8.3 million self-lit OLED pixels.

features.title: Brightness Booster Max²
features.description: The LG OLED evo G3's Brightness Booster Max produces up to 70% brighter images,² for luminous, high-contrast picture quality, even in well-lit rooms.

features.title: One-Wall Design
features.description: Mounts like a picture. An included wall bracket leaves virtually no space between the wall and TV when hung.³ Table Top Stand sold separately.

features.title: Art Gallery
features.description: When you're not watching, display paintings, photos and other content to blend the LG OLED evo G3 into your surroundings.

features.title: α9 AI Processor Gen6

features.description: Less searching, more streaming, thanks to the next generation of AI technology. Enjoy your favorite content including fitness, sports, entertainment and more.⁴ Use the Magic Remote to easily find what you're looking for.

features.title: LG Channels

features.title: FILMMAKER MODE

features.title: Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos⁵
features.description: Experience the magic of the big screen right from your couch. Every LG OLED comes loaded with Dolby Vision⁴ for extraordinary color, contrast and brightness, plus Dolby Atmos⁴ for wrap-around sound.

features.title: Ultimate Gaming
features.description: NVIDIA G-Sync, AMD FreeSync Premium and VRR to further improve gaming quality. Four HDMI 2.1 inputs allow you to plug in all the devices you need. Whether you game on consoles or on the cloud,⁶ the LG Game Dashboard and Game Optimizer put all the control at your fingertips.

features.title: Confidence that goes the distance
features.description: With a 5-year panel warranty⁷—and industry-leading tech perfected over a decade—you can watch on and on with confidence and peace of mind that we stand behind our premium LG OLED evo TVs.

reviews.name: LG UHD Review
reviews.reviewBody: Very good TV for the money. The only things that keep me from giving it 5 stars are: 1. There are only 2 HDMI inputs, and no standard A/V inputs for older DVD / BLU RAY players without HDMI outputs. 2. All picture settings a pre-set. So you can't tweak the picture. Vivid is too bright, and Sports look artificial. APS seems to be the best compromise. But, for under $400.00, it's a good TV.

reviews.name: LG UHD
reviews.reviewBody: I bought this for my mother because I have the same. I have had my T.V. for appox. 5 years. No problems. easy hook-ups in back of t.v. , Nice picture and color. Easy hook-up to wall mount. Best LG t.v. compare to others. My mother thinks it huge compared to her 20 year old t.v.

reviews.name: LG Superstar
reviews.reviewBody: This is an amazing TV. It has a full slate of the most popular apps, is very responsive, has automatic pickup of powered external devices hooked up to the HDMI ports, and doesn't have to be restarted immediately due to systems updates. It is a solid TV and was worth the price.

descriptions.long: Dive into a world of free content and personalized recommendations for everyone you share the remote with. Enhance your picture and sound with AI from the α5 Gen5 AI Processor 4K that is engineered to amaze by transforming your regular content into 4K for sharper definition and detail, even on our biggest screens.¹ Take binge-watching further by customizing your viewing experience with separate accounts and personalized recommendations for every member of your family with webOS 22. And enjoy binge-worthy streaming with built-in access to Netflix, Prime Video, the Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max² and to over 300+ free LG Channels.³ with everything from comedy to movies to sports. For gamers, you can make it the best gaming experience by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location with the LG Game Optimizer and Dashboard. Bring your content to life with LG UHD. See a vivid picture every time with LG UHD’s 4K resolution.

reviews.name: Absolutely eye catching
reviews.reviewBody: When I went into Best Buy I couldn’t believe my eyes I thought it was too good to be true. Then I asked the very helpful front desk and they assisted me through the whole process even help me get a 65 in tv into a Hyundai Elantra somehow. I take it home I of course had to turn it on and watch avatar and when I tell you it looks much much better than when I saw it in theaters 4D… the depth, the colors it was so much to take in and I couldn’t watch it alone I brought my brother and cooked some popcorn and relaxed and for 3 hours we were still not bored! To make a Long story short loving every second this tv and if I could buy two I would and the price is amazing I couldn’t ask for anymore my name is Nick and this is a tv!

reviews.name: GREAT TV..........BUT...
reviews.reviewBody: It's a great tv for the money. It has 2 knocks that matter to me. The sound VOLUME is lacking no matter what setting you use. I found it the best to set it on "auto" in the sound section to get the most volume out of this tv. Hook it to a sound bar is what they want you to do and kinda funny how Samsung includes their sound bar brochure to lure you to buy their's. I think the bad volume is a selling ploy. I ran the sound thru my stereo and its awesome. This TV also is a little funky when navigating the internet. I still recommend this tv. Add a sound bar/stereo fixes the sound. The funky navigating of the internet thing may be just the content I access. shhhhhhh lol. I include 2 pictures -  one with the tv off and one with the tv on.

reviews.name: Perfect TV for the price!
reviews.reviewBody: Perfect TV for the price! Great picture quality, brighter, Sound is OK, but I am using sound bar so do not feel a problem with that. Initially had network connectivity issues, did couple of resets and it worked perfect after that. Remote could have been better as it lags the voice control option which is a good to have feature now. Also, the button click sound is annoying if we need to type something, firestick remotes are less noisier. I bought it for a better price and I am satisfied with the product. Bestbuy is the best place to buy!

features.title: PurColor
features.description: See a wider spectrum of colors than traditional RGB models with PurColor. From green turf to an amazing sunset, you’ll enjoy true-to-life picture quality with our innovative color technology.

features.title: Crystal Processor with 4K UHD Upscaling
features.description: Go from good to great. Watch the content you love upgraded to dazzling 4K resolution. You’ll be able to better enjoy your TV’s capabilities as the Crystal Processor automatically transforms color, sound and more.

features.title: Mega Contrast
features.description: See more detail as our Mega Contrast analyzes and adjusts each image. Every frame appears more natural, and a feeling of depth is added as contrast is dialed up in the foreground.

features.title: HDR
features.description: Take in an impressive spectrum of colors and fine details, even in the darkest scenes. Brightness and contrast are automatically dialed into their ideal levels in every frame so you can see your content as it’s meant to be seen.

features.title: Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Get in the mix with Object Tracking Sound Lite. You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio.

features.title: Q-Symphony
features.description: Amp up your audio with the greatest duo of all time—Samsung TVs paired with a Samsung soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one.
Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience.¹

descriptions.long: Enjoy versatile projection for remote work, home entertainment and beyond with the Epson EpiqVision Flex CO-W01 Portable Projector. Designed to bring more ease and convenience to your workday, the Epson EpiqVision Flex CO-W01 Portable Projector delivers a widescreen picture up to 300"—that’s four times larger than a 75" flat panel—for collaborative online meetings and detailed presentations. Perfect for engaging at-home learning, immersive movie watching and more, this 3,000-lumen projector1 offers Best-in-Class Color Brightness2 to deliver crisp, colorful images in virtually any lighting environment—even during the daytime. Sleek and compact, this portable projector can be easily carried in bags and backpacks for easy viewing virtually anywhere. And, with a built-in HDMI® port and speaker, you can conveniently stream movies, TV shows and more using your favorite streaming device for a truly amazing viewing experience.

specifications.definition: Projectors with this feature allow for digital adjustment to the projected image size without changing the location of the projector.
The light source's estimated length of operating time when economy mode is enabled.

This security feature consists of a small port on the device that allows for the connection of an anchor and security cable, typically secured with a key or combination lock, to prevent it from being easily carried away.

The device is capable of communicating with another device via Bluetooth, provided they are within the required range of each other. A Bluetooth-enabled device must also be the same Bluetooth version or higher than the accessory it is intended to pair with.
Denotes the product’s visual process, sometimes manufacturer specific, used to display an image.
The light source's estimated length of operating time when normal operating mode is enabled.

Measurement of the device's white light output. The more lumens, the brighter the output. In large and/or well-lit environments, such as auditoriums or rooms with plenty of natural light, a higher brightness improves the quality of the projected image.

This measurement indicates what size of projected image can be produced from a certain distance. The smaller the ratio, the closer the projector can be to the screen while still producing a large image.

Measurement of the device's color light output. The more lumens, the brighter the output. In large and/or well-lit environments, such as auditoriums or rooms with plenty of natural light, a higher brightness improves the color quality of the projected image.
Indicates whether the product is designed and intended to be easily carried or needs to remain in place.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.

Projectors with this technology are able to display images with optimal brightness, color, and detail. Because of their high-performance design, these projectors are primarily used in large venues and digital cinemas.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.

"Keystone effect" refers to the distortion of an image when it is projected on an angled surface or when the projector is positioned too high or too low from the center of the display. Projectors with a digital keystone correction feature are able to scale the image as needed before it is projected, resulting in the correct image orientation no matter where it is displayed.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
The method used to focus the device in order to view or display a sharper image.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.

This feature enables the projector to receive HDMI audio and video signals without the use of a cable. Instead, a transmitter is plugged into the HDMI port of a video source and a receiver into the HDMI port of the display device. Projectors may come equipped with the input and receiver or may be adapted to use this feature.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.

Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.
The out of box weight of the item.
A feature that connects home theater systems, gaming consoles and other devices directly to the TV, removing the need for an extra audio cable.

specifications.definition: The distance from the screen that the projector can be placed to project images. Standard throw projectors typically need to be at least 6 feet away while short throw and ultra short throw projectors can be placed closer to the screen for use in smaller rooms.
The measurement of the width of a screen compared to the height of a screen, expressed as a ratio.
Universal mounts can be adjusted to support a variety of devices. Dedicated mounts are designed to fit a specific device.

Native resolution of a screen refers to its single, fixed resolution. Sometimes screens must scale an image up or down in order to fit the native resolution. This can cause a loss of resolution or detail.
The out of box depth of the item. Depth is measured as the distance from the front of the item to the back as it would be primarily used or placed.
The out of box height of the item. Height is measured as the vertical distance from the bottom of the item to the top as it would be primarily used or placed.

reviews.name: My TV aid smarter than me.
reviews.reviewBody: We decided to go larger than our 42” LG TV. We were limited by a cabinet my wife could not let go or else I would be reviewing a 70+” TV. This is a truly smart TV and has outsmarted me because I am still trying to figure certain features out. I truly long for the days of simple TV’s but since that day is long gone I will just have to work harder at learning what this one will do. The picture is gorgeous and really big compared to what we had. The sound is good and the closed captioning is easy to read now. I guess you can teach an old dog a few new tricks.

reviews.name: Yo! This is TV is the bomb diggity!
reviews.reviewBody: This TV is the bomb! I am still floored at how cheap it was for such a kickass TV. It's a Samsung and it is the shiznit! I have a Galaxy phone and integrates really nice with the TV. I turned this sucker on and my darn phone saw it, and it saw the phone. I clicked one button and the phone set the TV for me. I feel like a Jetson! Getchoo one!

reviews.name: Huge upgrade
reviews.reviewBody:
Considering the last Samsung I purchased was in 2010, this is night and day to compare. I still kept the old one and moved it to another room. 
The features on the new model include all of our favorite apps ready to log in! The clarity is superb but it took some time getting used to the higher frame rate (refresh rate..not sure). The best feature on this model I find are the vivid colors and automatic high definition adjusting. Watching older movies with updated clarity is pretty neat!
Looking forward to seeing how this tv holds up for another ten years

descriptions.long: True-to-life color. Effortless connectivity. Dazzling 4K value. Samsung Crystal UHD is worth a look (and more). Effortlessly access TV shows, movies and ambient content using the Samsung Smart Hub, or find a range of great games on the Samsung Gaming Hub.* Enjoy content even more clear than it was created as its upgraded to 4K resolution

features.title: PurColor
features.description: See a wider spectrum of colors than traditional RGB models with PurColor. From green turf to an amazing sunset, you’ll enjoy true-to-life picture quality with our innovative color technology.

features.title: Crystal Processor with 4K UHD Upscaling
features.description: Go from good to great. Watch the content you love upgraded to dazzling 4K resolution. You’ll be able to better enjoy your TV’s capabilities as the Crystal Processor automatically transforms color, sound and more.

features.title: Mega Contrast
features.description: See more detail as our Mega Contrast analyzes and adjusts each image. Every frame appears more natural, and a feeling of depth is added as contrast is dialed up in the foreground.

features.title: HDR
features.description: Take in an impressive spectrum of colors and fine details, even in the darkest scenes. Brightness and contrast are automatically dialed into their ideal levels in every frame so you can see your content as it’s meant to be seen.

features.title: Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Get in the mix with Object Tracking Sound Lite. You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio.

features.title: Q-Symphony
features.description: Amp up your audio with the greatest duo of all time—Samsung TVs paired with a Samsung soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one.
Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience.¹

features.title: Samsung Smart TV Hub
features.description: Finding what everyone wants to watch is effortless with the easy-to-use Samsung Smart TV Hub. Movies, TV show and games are all available on a home screen tailored to you.²

features.title: Samsung Gaming Hub
features.description: Where gaming comes together. Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required.³
¹ Q-Series and S-Series soundbars sold separately.
² Content services may vary by regions and are subject to  change without notifications
³ High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required.

reviews.name: Great Picture Quality, Unresponsive Remote Control
reviews.reviewBody:
This is my first LG TV and it’s a good buy for the price. The picture quality is great and the sound quality is also impressive. It delivers crisp and clearer pictures and it also pumps more bass from my JBL sound bar’s 10” subwoofer better than my other TV. 
I would have given a 5 star but the remote control is very unresponsive to the point that I thought the batteries were bad few minutes after unboxing. I replaced them with new energizer batteries but I still encountered the problem. It also has a slower refresh rate. 
LG could do better with this remote control issue and refresh rate.

reviews.name: WOW
reviews.reviewBody: I just picked my TV up Friday November 3rd, 2023....and IT IS MASSIVE! The picture is clear, and crisp, and the sound is wonderful....(to my liking) however....I'm going to add a sound bar, or maybe even a full surround sound system to experience the movie theater effects. This 86 inch LG TV exceeds my expectations! And, I'm very excited I decided to purchase! It's a great investment! And, I'm looking forward to watching my movies on this massive screen....WOW! It truly is an incredible tv

reviews.name: Worth the money
reviews.reviewBody: VERY big with a great picture at CC a great price.  The sound is very good compared to other flat screens I’ve had which brings me to a problem.  Tried unsuccessfully to hook up my surround sound(Sony receiver & Yamaha speakers).  Worked great with my previous 65 “ LG.  I cannot get it to work with this unit so for now I am running off factory speakers

description: Shop Samsung 43" Class TU690T Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Read if using for gaming consoles
reviews.reviewBody:
You get what you pay for, which isn't entirely a bad thing. I had no interest in using the smart TV features such as streaming apps, I simply wanted a larger display to use with gaming consoles, mainly a PS5.

While The color gamut isn't the widest, the contrast ratio isn't crazy, and the brightness isn't blinding, I'm very content with my purchase. Colors still pop, and the screen still gets bright enough to fill a dim room.

I appreciate that when switching to a console (Tested a PS5 and Nintendo Switch) the TV automatically switches to game mode and drastically reduces input delay. I've experienced zero stuttering like I have with other TVs while using game mode. 

 The speakers aren't anything special, would not listen to music on them, but for casual games they're acceptable. Definitely recommend headphones.

For anyone that wants to change the settings out of the box, i recommend completely turning off sharpening and turning down color to 20 (30 is the default) to get rid of oversaturation and blown out details. As with all TVs, getting the best desired picture requires tweaking.



Overall, I'd recommend this TV if you aren't super picky about your display, want something on the smaller side, and wanna game on a big display on a budget.

If you want the best color range, incredible contrast and blinding brightness, this isn't for you.  But if you keep your expectations in check, I think you'll be happy with your purchase.

reviews.name: # 1 The best
reviews.reviewBody: I been having this TV for a while, works great Beautiful color Ipaid a low price for such a great TV First smart TV we own hope to buy more in the furture. Samsung has always been number one for me.

reviews.reviewBody: Actually a really good TV for the price. Easy to navigate and use, decent picture. Overall absolutely worth the price

reviews.name: Very nice television with great sound.
reviews.reviewBody:
I love the TV.  The center stand looks much better than the usual two little legs on the right and left that most TVs have.  However, the stand does not adjust up or down.
One thing that I don't like is the lack of connections on the back of the TV.  For this level of TV I would expect more, such as RCA and VGA connections and a 3.5mm sound connection.  One of the connections isn't even for the user. It's a 3.5mm data connection that is for service technicians.
Note that this is a big TV and the signifcant center stand adds weight to it.  I highly suggest that you have two people to unpack and move the TV around.

reviews.name: Great picture, Easy to use Operating System
reviews.reviewBody: I was looking for a replacement for my Sony Bravia with backlighting that shot craps after 2.5 years.  I have wanted to try Samsung based on the brand's reputation.  Orinally looked at the Q60 and Q70 because of the cheaper price, but the picture on this Q80 is better and brighter.  We are really happy with the picture and the operating system is simple to use.

reviews.name: Great Quality, Performance, and Value
reviews.reviewBody: We replaced a 55" TV of a lesser quality brand that developed a problem with the LED edge backlighting with this 65" Samsung QLED TV. We can't be more pleased with the quality and performance of this model. We especially like the Smart TV features which allow us to seamlessly switch between streaming services, HDMI input, and the Samsung TV offerings. The price was very reasonable as well.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number of digital cables carrying analog (VGA) video signals that can be connected to the product.
This is technology that's specific to a TV brand (sometimes called proprietary technology). Here you'll see terms related to picture quality, brightness, processors and more.
values: Neural Quantum Processor 4K, One Billion Color, Wide Viewing Angle, Supreme UHD Dimming, Motion Xcelerator Turbo+

specifications.definition: VGA (Video Graphics Adapter or Video Graphics Array) is a display standard that transmits via analog signals. This type of interface is typically used to connect a computer to a display device such as a monitor, projector, or TV.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
RS-232 inputs are the serial-data standard for telecommunications. The more inputs the PC or device has, the more peripherals (TVs, monitors) it can connect to and control.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.

The device is capable of communicating with another device via Bluetooth, provided they are within the required range of each other. A Bluetooth-enabled device must also be the same Bluetooth version or higher than the accessory it is intended to pair with.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
An input that receives uncompressed HDMI signals over a category cable point-to-point, up to 100 meters, from a transmitter.
Near field microphones require you to be very close to the device for the sound to be picked up. Far field microphones allow you to speak to a device from a distance.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The number of standard definition analog video (typically at 480i or 576i resolution) sources that can be connected to the device.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
The number of component analog video (CAV) sources that can be connected to the device.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
Improves clarity of dialogue in audio playback. This is typically achieved with dedicated speakers and/or technology that separates dialogue from the rest of the audio in order to make it clearer.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
Measurement of electrical power.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.

specifications.displayName: Number of Digital Optical Audio Outputs

specifications.definition: Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
A connection on the device that fits an ethernet cable and allows for connection to wired network hardware.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.
A feature that connects home theater systems, gaming consoles and other devices directly to the TV, removing the need for an extra audio cable.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.
